title: Find First Non-Numeric Character
description:
FINDB_NONUM STR searches from right to left and returns
the last position which is not a number.
Numbers are the letters "0..9" and "."
name: FINDB_NONUM

input.name: str
input.description: The string in which to search for a non-numeric character.

return_value.description: The position of the first non-numeric character found in the string. Returns 0 if no non-numeric character is found.
